trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_SEQ_00<tab>Gelther does not like the way you are looking at him, but will let it pass if you deliver a message for him.

TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_SEQ_01<tab>A somewhat enraged Gelther has demanded that you deliver a rather colorful ultimatum to Didilata, who has failed to repay his debt. Find Didilata and impress upon him the gravity of the situation.
TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_SEQ_02<tab>Without hesitation, the Lalafell pledges to repay the money owed. Given his frantic stuttering, you have little reason to doubt his sincerity.
TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_GELTHER_000_1<tab>Hey, you! I saw you lookin' at me. You got somethin' to say? Huh!?

TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_GELTHER_000_2<tab>No? Well, <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> do! You know Didilata? Short, broke, never pays what he owes? Yeah, that bleedin' whoreson! Tell him to pay up, or I swear by the Twelve I'll beat him so hard it'll feel like the second comin' of Dalamud!
TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_GELTHER_000_3<tab>If I see that little shite's face, I'll end up poundin' him into a bloody pulp, like as not. So you go and tell him!
TEXT_SUBWIL001_00150_DIDILATA_000_6<tab>A-Alright, alright! I'll give back every gil I owe! I swear it! B-But no more beatings, I b-b-beg you!
